name: df-rr3
body: |- wceq(crr3c, co(cr, cmap, ctp(nat1, nat2, nat3)))
comment: Define the set of all points ` RR3 ` . We define each point ` A ` as a function to allow the use of vector addition and subtraction as well as scalar multiplication in our proofs. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 15-Jul-2012.)
